sourcesContent:
import React, { useState } from 'react'; import { useAuth } from '../contexts/AuthContext'; import { useChat } from '../contexts/ChatContext'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import { Users, MessageCircle, Calendar, Star, TrendingUp, BookOpen, Settings, Bell, Search, Filter, ArrowRight, Clock, DollarSign, Award, Eye, Heart } from 'lucide-react'; const DashboardPage = () => { const { currentUser } = useAuth(); const { conversations, unreadCount } = useChat(); const [activeTab, setActiveTab] = useState('overview'); const isTeacher = currentUser?.role === 'teacher'; // Mock data for dashboard const stats = { totalStudents: 45, totalEarnings: 2840, totalHours: 127, averageRating: 4.8, upcomingLessons: 3, unreadMessages: unreadCount }; const recentActivity = [ { id: 1, type: 'lesson', title: 'Math tutoring session with Alex', time: '2 hours ago', status: 'completed' }, { id: 2, type: 'message', title: 'New message from Sarah', time: '4 hours ago', status: 'unread' }, { id: 3, type: 'booking', title: 'New lesson booking from Mike', time: '1 day ago', status: 'pending' } ]; const upcomingLessons = [ { id: 1, student: 'Emma Wilson', subject: 'Calculus', time: 'Tomorrow, 2:00 PM', duration: '1 hour' }, { id: 2, student: 'John Davis', subject: 'Physics', time: 'Wednesday, 4:00 PM', duration: '1.5 hours' } ]; const renderTeacherDashboard = () => (
{/* Stats Cards */}

Total Students

{stats.totalStudents}

Total Earnings

${stats.totalEarnings}

Teaching Hours

{stats.totalHours}h

Average Rating

{stats.averageRating}

{/* Quick Actions */}

Quick Actions

View Messages

{stats.unreadMessages} unread

{/* Upcoming Lessons */}

Upcoming Lessons

View all
{upcomingLessons.map(lesson => (

{lesson.student}

{lesson.subject}

{lesson.time}

{lesson.duration}

))}
{/* Recent Activity */}

Recent Activity

{recentActivity.map(activity => (
{activity.type === 'lesson' && } {activity.type === 'message' && } {activity.type === 'booking' && }

{activity.title}

{activity.time}

{activity.status}
))}
); const renderStudentDashboard = () => (
{/* Stats Cards */}

Active Teachers

8

Total Lessons

24

Upcoming

3

Unread Messages

{stats.unreadMessages}

{/* Quick Actions */}

Quick Actions

Find Teachers

Browse available tutors

Messages

{stats.unreadMessages} unread

{/* Recent Teachers */}

Recent Teachers

View all
{[1, 2, 3, 4].map(i => (

Dr. Sarah Johnson

Mathematics

4.9
))}
); return (
{/* Header */}

Welcome back, {currentUser?.name}!

{isTeacher ? 'Here\'s what\'s happening with your teaching business' : 'Track your learning progress and connect with teachers'}

{/* Tabs */}
{['overview', 'lessons', 'messages', 'analytics'].map(tab => ( ))}
{/* Dashboard Content */}
{activeTab === 'overview' && ( isTeacher ? renderTeacherDashboard() : renderStudentDashboard() )} {activeTab === 'lessons' && (

Lessons

Lesson management features coming soon...

)} {activeTab === 'messages' && (

Messages

Go to Messages
)} {activeTab === 'analytics' && (

Analytics

Analytics dashboard coming soon...

)}
); }; export default DashboardPage;
